com.metricstream.systemi.client.servlet.docviewer

Class DocSignManifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metricstream.systemi.client.servlet.docviewer.DocSignManifest

  • public final class DocSignManifest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to apply signatue manifest data when a push infolet has a doc attachment specifed and manifest signature is chosen.
